ThingDef.label: Bang Bus Wreck
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken van. Everything that isn't rusted away was looted long ago. Given enough resources, it can be restored into a BangBus.

ThingDef.label: vending machine
ThingDef.description: A standard vending machine for guests.

ThingDef.label: medieval vending machine
ThingDef.description: A vending machine for guests that requires no power.

RecipeDef.label: make electrical cables
RecipeDef.description: Crudely make a few electrical cables out of steel and cloth.

RecipeDef.label: extract electrical cables from components
RecipeDef.description: Extract whatever electrical cable you can find in a batch of components.

RecipeDef.label: manufacture electrical cables
RecipeDef.description: Manufacture a large amount of electrical cables out of steel and chemfuel.

RecipeDef.label: make pipes
RecipeDef.description: Make a few low quality pipes out of steel.

RecipeDef.label: manufacture pipes
RecipeDef.description: Manufacture a large amount of high quality pipes out of steel.

RecipeDef.label: smelt electrical cables
RecipeDef.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to break down electrical cables into useful metallic materials.

RecipeDef.label: smelt pipes
RecipeDef.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to break down pipes into useful metallic materials.

ThingDef.label: electrical cable
ThingDef.description: An assembly of electrical wires, bundled inside a protective sheath. Electrical cables may be used for transmission of electrical power or signals.

ThingDef.label: pipe
ThingDef.description: A solid hollow cylinder meant for transporting fluids and flowing solids. Pipes are typically used in plumbing, i.e to move sewage, water and air around.

li.text: Game restart required for changes to take effect

li.label: Remove VVE Engine and Wheels
li.tooltip: Removes VVE's engine and wheel components entirely, turn off if using other mods that need those components and aren't patched.

li.label: Broad ReplaceLib Patch (Requires ReplaceLib)
li.tooltip: Enables a patch to completely replace VVE engine and wheel defs with Engine Industries' ones using Ferny's ReplaceLib, should make any mods I haven't manually patched somewhat compatible.

li.label: Original EI Recipe Locations
li.tooltip: Re-enables the original recipe locations for Engine Industries

ThingDef.label: greater clawer dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste with huge claws that is specialized in aggression and damage-dealing attacks. Its enhancement has improved their combat prowess and strengthened the wings, permitting them to ignore terrain movement penalties.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.

ThingDef.label: greater barkskin dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in absorbing hits during combat. Its enhancement has created multiple layers of hardened bark and deadened all pain receptors. Can act as a mobile form of cover.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.

ThingDef.label: greater woodmaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in wood production. Its enhancement has accelerated the wood-like material production and instilled a motherly instinct to create nests made of numerous twigs.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.

ThingDef.label: greater medicinemaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in medicine production. Its enhancement has accelerated the herbal production and gives them a large nodule that slowly accumulated neutroamine, which can be milked when full.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.

ThingDef.label: greater berrymaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in food production. Its enhancement has accelerated the berry production and instills an instinct to bury parts of its peeling hide that are entirely similar to regular berry bushes.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.

ThingDef.label: greater stonedigger dryad
ThingDef.description: An extremely easy-going caste of dryad which specializes in finding stone chunks. Its enhancement has instilled a sense of awe and strengthened pincers, drawing envy from stone ruins and carving excavated stone chunks into blocks to build a better shell.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.

ThingDef.label: greater nectarmaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A curious dryad caste specialized in ambrosia production. Its enhancement has accelerated the ambrosia production.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.

ThingDef.label: greater spitter dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in territorialism and can launch ranged acid projectiles. Its enhancement has improved their range and adds large acid reservoirs that explode when the dryad dies.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.

ThingDef.label: greater gaubricmaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A caste of dryad which specializes in producing a unique shaggy, leather-like material. Its enhancement has accelerated the fabric production and lengthens the shagginess, making it quite adorable.\n\nGreater dryads are more capable than their smaller kin but most gauranlen trees lack the power to support them.
